b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", viewAll: "", postAuthor: , postAuthorLabel: "", postDate: , postDateLabel: "" }

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "litespot-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "litespot-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads")) or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.headerad_onpost == "1px") and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "ticker"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "featured"))

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "content-section-1"))
b:section.name: Content Section 1

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", viewAll: "", postAuthor: , postAuthorLabel: "", postDate: , postDateLabel: "" }

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "litespot-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "litespot-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "content-section-2"))
b:section.name: Content Section 2

b:widget.title: Nepali Graphics - Learn design, Animation, and Progrmming

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "litespot-pro-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "litespot-pro-post-footer-ads"))
b:section.name: Post ADS 3

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads")) or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.footerad_onpost == "1px") and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads"))

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: You can find Web themes, Adobe XD Design, PSD mockup File, Illustrator Vector file, Blogger Templates, Transition, Intro, Outro, software guide, and many more.
Our website uses cookies to improve your experience. Learn more
